data.title: Regent University Accreditation
data.meta_description: Is Regent University accredited? Find out what type of accreditation Regent has and what it means.
data.text:
Is Regent Accredited?

Who is giving a nod to Regent? Read about what accreditations we found for this school.

Regent University Is Regionally Accredited

Regional accreditation is a good thing. Attending a regionally accredited institution is important if you may want to transfer credits to another institution or if you want to attend a post-graduate program.

Accreditations Recognized by the Department of Education

Accreditations Recognized by the Council for Higher Education Accreditation
